title: Easy Asparagus and Mushroom Frittata
ingredients: ['1 knob butter', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '250g fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2cm pieces', '250g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '6 eggs', '1 tablespoon water', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme', '3 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '50g grated mozzarella cheese']
